section.title: Cloud Scaling
section.para: In &product; a total of 200 total compute nodes in a single region (Region0) across any of the following hypervisors is supported:
You can distribute the compute nodes in any number of deployments as long as the total is no more than 200. Example: 100 ESX + 100 KVM or 50 ESX + 150 KVM.
&product; supports a total of 8000 virtual machines across a total of 200 compute nodes.
